message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper discusses deep learning-based video captioning, which involves computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also investigates the impact of different components on the overall performance, which falls under the domain of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. Finally, the paper uses a popular dataset for video captioning, which falls under the domain of multimedia (MM), making cs.MM a possible sub-category.
